title: BRIEF-Performance Food Reports Q3 Adj EPS Of $0.34
text:
May 9, 2018 / 12:51 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Performance Food Reports Q3 Adj EPS Of $0.34 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Performance Food Group Co:
* PERFORMANCE FOOD GROUP COMPANY REPORTS THIRD-QUARTER AND FIRST-NINE MONTHS FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * Q3 SALES $4.3 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $4.45 BILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY TOTAL CASE VOLUME GREW 0.8%
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.54-$1.61, UP 24-30 PERCENT FROM FY 2017 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $1.24
* NOW EXPECTS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR FISCAL 2018 WILL BE BETWEEN $115 MILLION AND $140 MILLION
* FOR FISCAL 2018, PFG TIGHTENS ITS FISCAL 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OUTLOOK FOR GROWTH TO A RANGE OF 9% TO 11% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
